text: I am in the basic / district of Istanbul
this place is like 15 minutes away from
Taksim Square from early morning
protesters have been gathering in this
spot and there has been police
intervention since early morning over
there there's a water cannon and there
are many protesters in front of it I
have seen protesters throwing stones at
the police and police responding with
tear gas and water cannon many people
here are wearing their gas masks because
of the excessive use of tear gas and I
have difficulty speaking to you at the
moment as well there is also a police
line in that road over there and there
are many protesters just waiting to see
what might happen their ultimate aim is
to lead to Taksim Square but on the road
there are many police lines and it
doesn't seem very realistic that they
might end up there without further
clashes taking place
